attributes.action: To ban teens (under 18s) from vaping and reduce vape production.
attributes.additional_details:
We need new rules  which will help us to reduce it.
If we dont teens are gonna affect thier health and their future
attributes.background: To reduce vape in connor shops so less teen can get them

rejection.details:
It is already illegal to sell e-cigarette products to under 18s.

You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Ban e-cigarette and vaping products for next generation:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648665

Ban the import and sale of e-cigarettes in the UK:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638546

Ban the import, manufacture, and sale of disposable e-cigarettes or vapes:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/638536

If you want the Government to do something else to reduce youth vaping, you could start a new petition clearly saying what you want the Government to do, but you would need to provide your full name.
